message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $110. Would you be willing to consider that?
I appreciate the compromise, but I'm still a bit short. Would you be willing to go down to $95?
I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob. I'm willing to make another compromise, but I need to make sure I get a fair price. I'm thinking $105 is a sweet spot. What do you think?
I'm getting close to my target, but I'd like to get a bit closer to $100. Would you be willing to meet me at $98?

I'm getting a bit concerned that we're getting close to the last rounds, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my target price. I'm thinking $108 is the minimum I can go. What do you think?
I understand you're trying to get closer to your target price, but I'm still a bit far from my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $100 and $108, which is $104. Would you consider that?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make one final concession. I can do $106, but that's as low as I can go. What do you think?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I really need to stick to my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $100, which is the maximum I'm willing to pay. Would you consider that?
